ing: 1/2 cup semisweet or bittersweet chocolate chips, melted (see Tip)
1 tablespoon 100% fruit jam, such as raspberry or cherry
des: "Stir a little melted chocolate into ricotta cheese for a cheesecake-like topping for chocolate wafer cookies."
ins: Combine melted chocolate and ricotta in a small bowl. Spoon a scant 1 tablespoon of the mixture on each chocolate wafer and top with 1/4 teaspoon jam.
